original_title: 静岡の温泉旅館で働く美人仲居さん AV DEBUT
overview: Let your familiar general woman make her AV debut! Based on the concept, I persuaded AV to a beautiful waitress who works at a local hot spring inn! The process of debuting, the moment of appearing in AV are all condensed! You can't miss the moment when such a cute Nakai makes her AV debut! !
title: Hot Spring Resort Waitress' AV Debut
